languages.text: "И в тебе, элантах... Я вижу много больше, чем просто очередн{mf|ого|ую} мон-кай. Твоя истинная сущность — в воле, что способна изменять мир вокруг внешне и внутренне. В умении созидать и понимать созданное. В возможности разрушать. В том, что не осознать разуму твоих собратьев и что не видно их примитивному взору... Но видно мне".

"And in you, elantach... I see much more than just another mon-keigh. Your true essence lies in your will, which is capable of changing the world around you and within you. It lies in your ability to create and to understand your creation, and in your ability to destroy. It lies in what your kin's minds cannot grasp, what their primitive sight cannot behold... But I can see it."
languages.original_text: "И в тебе, элантах... Я вижу много больше, чем просто очередн{mf|ого|ую} мон-кай. Твоя истинная сущность — в воле, что способна изменять мир вокруг внешне и внутренне. В умении созидать и понимать созданное. В возможности разрушать. В том, что не осознать разуму твоих собратьев и что не видно их примитивному взору... Но видно мне".

It lies in your ability to create and to understand your creation, and in your ability to destroy. It lies in what your kin's minds cannot grasp, what their primitive sight cannot behold... But I can see it."

It lies in your ability to create and to understand your creation, and in your ability to destroy. It lies in what your kin's minds cannot grasp, what their primitive sight cannot behold... But I can see it."

It lies in your ability to create and to understand your creation, and in your ability to destroy. It lies in what your kin's minds cannot grasp, what their primitive sight cannot behold... But I can see it."

"And in you, elantach... I see much more than just another mon-keigh. Your true essence lies in your will, which is capable of changing the world around you and within you. It lies in your ability to create and to understand your creation, and in your ability to destroy. It lies in what your kin's minds cannot grasp, what their primitive sight cannot behold... But I can see it."

languages.text: «Y en ti, elantach... veo mucho más que un vulgar mon-keigh. Tu verdadera esencia está en tu voluntad, capaz de cambiar el mundo a tu alrededor y en tu propio interior. Está en tu capacidad para crear y para comprender tu creación, y también en tu capacidad para destruir. Está en lo que las mentes de tus congéneres no alcanzan a comprender, en lo que su primitiva visión no les permite contemplar... Pero yo sí lo veo».
languages.original_text: "And in you, elantach... I see much more than just another mon-keigh. Your true essence lies in your will, which is capable of changing the world around you and within you. It lies in your ability to create and to understand your creation, and in your ability to destroy. It lies in what your kin's minds cannot grasp, what their primitive sight cannot behold... But I can see it."

traits.locale_text: «Y en ti, elantach... veo mucho más que un vulgar mon-keigh. Tu verdadera esencia está en tu voluntad, capaz de cambiar el mundo a tu alrededor y en tu propio interior. Está en tu capacidad para crear y para comprender tu creación, y también en tu capacidad para destruir. Está en lo que las mentes de tus congéneres no alcanzan a comprender, en lo que su primitiva visión no les permite contemplar... Pero yo sí lo veo».

languages.text: 「エランタ、お前には…ただのモン＝ケイとは違う何かがある。お前の本質はお前の意志にあり、周囲の世界や自分自身を変える力を持っている。お前の創造する力にあり、創造したものを理解する力にあり、破壊する力にある。お前の血族が持つ原始的な視点では把握できないものを持っているが…我にはそれが見えるのだ」
languages.original_text: "And in you, elantach... I see much more than just another mon-keigh. Your true essence lies in your will, which is capable of changing the world around you and within you. It lies in your ability to create and to understand your creation, and in your ability to destroy. It lies in what your kin's minds cannot grasp, what their primitive sight cannot behold... But I can see it."

traits.locale_text: 「エランタ、お前には…ただのモン＝ケイとは違う何かがある。お前の本質はお前の意志にあり、周囲の世界や自分自身を変える力を持っている。お前の創造する力にあり、創造したものを理解する力にあり、破壊する力にある。お前の血族が持つ原始的な視点では把握できないものを持っているが…我にはそれが見えるのだ」

languages.text: “而你，外界人……你在我眼里，远远不仅仅是普通的猴子。你的本质存在于你的意志之中，你有能力改变周围的世界与你内心的世界。你的本质存在于你的能力之中，你能够创造并理解你的造物，同时也能毁灭它们。你的本质，存在于你的同类狭隘的目光无法触及之处……但我却看得一清二楚。”
languages.original_text: "And in you, elantach... I see much more than just another mon-keigh. Your true essence lies in your will, which is capable of changing the world around you and within you. It lies in your ability to create and to understand your creation, and in your ability to destroy. It lies in what your kin's minds cannot grasp, what their primitive sight cannot behold... But I can see it."

traits.locale_text: “而你，外界人……你在我眼里，远远不仅仅是普通的猴子。你的本质存在于你的意志之中，你有能力改变周围的世界与你内心的世界。你的本质存在于你的能力之中，你能够创造并理解你的造物，同时也能毁灭它们。你的本质，存在于你的同类狭隘的目光无法触及之处……但我却看得一清二楚。”

languages.text: « Et en vous, elantach, je vois bien plus qu'{mf|un|une} simple mon-keigh comme les autres. Votre véritable essence réside dans cette volonté capable de changer votre monde intérieur et celui qui vous entoure. Elle réside dans votre capacité à créer et à comprendre votre création, mais aussi à détruire. Elle réside dans ce que l'esprit de vos semblables ne peut saisir, dans ce que leur vue primitive ne peut voir... Mais moi, je le vois. »
languages.original_text: "And in you, elantach... I see much more than just another mon-keigh. Your true essence lies in your will, which is capable of changing the world around you and within you. It lies in your ability to create and to understand your creation, and in your ability to destroy. It lies in what your kin's minds cannot grasp, what their primitive sight cannot behold... But I can see it."

traits.locale_text: « Et en vous, elantach, je vois bien plus qu'{mf|un|une} simple mon-keigh comme les autres. Votre véritable essence réside dans cette volonté capable de changer votre monde intérieur et celui qui vous entoure. Elle réside dans votre capacité à créer et à comprendre votre création, mais aussi à détruire. Elle réside dans ce que l'esprit de vos semblables ne peut saisir, dans ce que leur vue primitive ne peut voir... Mais moi, je le vois. »

languages.text: "Und in Euch, Elantach ... sehe ich so viel mehr als nur einen weiteren Chem-Pan-Sey. Eure wahre Essenz liegt in Eurem Willen, der in der Lage ist, die Welt um Euch herum und in Euch zu verändern. Sie liegt in Eurer Fähigkeit, zu erschaffen und das von Euch Erschaffte zu verstehen. Und in ihrer Fähigkeit, zu zerstören. Sie liegt darin, was der Verstand Eurer Artgenossen nicht begreifen kann, was ihr primitiver Blick nicht erkennen kann ... Doch ich kann es sehen."
languages.original_text: "And in you, elantach... I see much more than just another mon-keigh. Your true essence lies in your will, which is capable of changing the world around you and within you. It lies in your ability to create and to understand your creation, and in your ability to destroy. It lies in what your kin's minds cannot grasp, what their primitive sight cannot behold... But I can see it."

traits.locale_text: "Und in Euch, Elantach ... sehe ich so viel mehr als nur einen weiteren Chem-Pan-Sey. Eure wahre Essenz liegt in Eurem Willen, der in der Lage ist, die Welt um Euch herum und in Euch zu verändern. Sie liegt in Eurer Fähigkeit, zu erschaffen und das von Euch Erschaffte zu verstehen. Und in ihrer Fähigkeit, zu zerstören. Sie liegt darin, was der Verstand Eurer Artgenossen nicht begreifen kann, was ihr primitiver Blick nicht erkennen kann ... Doch ich kann es sehen."

languages.text: "Sende elantach... Herhangi bir mon-keigh'den daha fazlasını görüyorum. Gerçek özün, etrafındaki ve içindeki dünyayı değiştirme kapasitesine sahip iradende yatıyor. Bir şeyler yaratma, yarattığını anlama ve yok etme kabiliyetinde yatıyor. Senin soyundan olanların zihinleriyle kavrayamadıklarında, ilkel gözleriyle göremediklerinde yatıyor... Ben bunları görebiliyorum."
languages.original_text: "And in you, elantach... I see much more than just another mon-keigh. Your true essence lies in your will, which is capable of changing the world around you and within you. It lies in your ability to create and to understand your creation, and in your ability to destroy. It lies in what your kin's minds cannot grasp, what their primitive sight cannot behold... But I can see it."

traits.locale_text: "Senin içinde elantach... Herhangi bir mon-keigh'den daha fazlasını görüyorum. Gerçek özün, etrafındaki ve içindeki dünyayı değiştirme kapasitesine sahip iradende yatıyor. Bir şeyler yaratma, yarattığını anlama ve yok etme kabiliyetinde yatıyor. Senin soyundan olanların zihinleriyle kavrayamadıklarında, ilkel gözleriyle göremediklerinde yatıyor... Fakat ben onu görebiliyorum."
